name: Art Wars: The NYC Art World Game
blurb: Art Wars is an adventure game set in the NYC art world. Can you survive or are you doomed to a cubical?
ksr_blurb: <p>Ever wanted to be the enfant terrible of the New York art scene? Here's your chance to make your way to the top, battling drug habits, bed bugs and that horror of horrors, gentrification along the way.</p>

rewards.reward: No Reward
Creative Karma.
An mp3 of the ArtWars soundtrack plus album art (and our gratitude).

ArtWars Condoms (yes, real (unused) condoms). An mp3 of the ArtWars soundtrack plus album art (and our gratitude). We will also high five you next time we bump into you. (if outside the US, sorry but please ask you add $5 for shipping for the condoms, not the high five).

For the cost of drink in the west village receive an mp3 of the ArtWars soundtrack and a special digital backer kit plus access to our production blog. We will also high five with you next time we bump into each other.

For the cost of your workday lunch get early access to the game, receive an mp3 of the ArtWars soundtrack and a special digital backer kit plus access to our production blog. We will also high five with you next time we bump into each other.

ArtWars Backer print. (The kickstater only print). \r\nNeed we say more? 110% cred for life! Be one of the first to display your brilliance publicly on your wall. All your friends will be impressed at your ability to spot artistic genus at work! This print will be suitable for framing. (If you are outside the US, please add 15$ for shipping). You will also receive beta access to the game, and an mp3 of the artwars soundtrack and access to our production blog.

ArtWars t-shirt (in your own size) plus early access to the game, your name in the credits and a digital download of art from ArtWars and access to our production blog (If you are outside the US, please add 15$ for shipping).

A limited and signed art piece from an Art Wars gallery.. This will be an actual piece from an exhibition opening IN the game. Its likely to be totally awesome to such a degree that if someone broke into your actual apartment, it would be the first thing they took (so maybe you should even pledge to get 2 of them, just to be safe). You will also receive beta access to the game. and a special digital backer kit (if outside the US please add $15 for shipping).

A limited edition ArtWars print (11x14") from one of the NYC artist featured in ArtWars. This is likely to be worth way more then the pledge amount. Each print is unique, numbered and signed and will include information about the artist (If you are outside the US, please add 15$ for shipping). You will also receive beta access to the game, a special digital backer kit and a high five next time we bump into you.

Bundle Pack BONUS!\r\nThe amazing ArtWars t-shirt (in your own size) plus early access to the game, your name in the credits and an mp3 of the artwars soundtrack! BUT THATS NOT ALL!! You will also receive the limited edition Art Wars print numbered and signed by a NYC artist featured in the game. The amazing ArtWars t-shirt (in your own size) plus early access to the game, ArtWar condoms and your name in the credits and an mp3 of the artwars soundtrack! (If outside the US, please add 15$ for shipping).
Surprise Reward. This is going to really rock your world. It will be picked out for you specifically by one of the artist featured in the game. It will be frame worthy, if not throne worthy.

ArtWars: The Book.\r\nReceive the documentation from the development of ArtWars in a catalog or book form. You will also receive your choice of an ArtWars backer print or t-shirt (in your size) (If outside the US please add $15 for shipping)

Become a part of history! A place, street or location of your choice will be designed and dropped into ArtWars. Don't just play the game, be part of the scene. You will also be the first group to be brought into the beta release!

Get name dropped. No really, become a character in ArtWars. We will design a character based off of you (or someone you love). What could be a better gift then that?\r\nYou will also receive your choice of an ArtWars print or t-shirt (in your size) and beta access to the game.

But... but.. I want it ALLLLLLL! \r\nNo problem! Pledge $425 and receive the mp3, the backer print, t-shirt, custom character and the ArtWars book plus early access to the game and your name in the credits (outside the US, please add 15$ for shipping).
Name Drop! (Institution, Gallery, Collective etc). This says it all.  We will design your institution/gallery/school into the games levels.
Receive a limited (and I mean limited) edition piece FROM ArtWars. There are only 9 of these prints in the entire world. Each will be numbered and signed and ready for framing.
Can't decide?! We can fix that!  Pledge just 1k (which is pocket change really, when you're a rockstar artist) and receive ALL the rewards plus a very special thank you from us.

Go big or go home. Hire us to finish the game to its fullest extent and we will design an entire level inspired by you, and as a thank you will fly to anywhere in the world to take you out to lunch and let you be the first to exclusively play the game. We will also bring with us enough T-shirts to have everyone on your block get one and maybe even bake you some cookies.
